content: Make technology cater to your lazy lifestyle by using the lying down laptop stand. This unique stand features an adjustable frame that lets the user regulate the angle of the stand in order to provide an optimum viewing experience while remaining in total comfort.

Keep the home or office as tidy as your dojo with help from these katana sword bookends. These killer bookends provide a decorative and functional way to organize all your martial arts how-to books in an orderly manner as you impale them with this mighty weapon.

Fear not the next time the A/C goes out because the USB computer fan will keep you nice and cool while you use your <del>pornbox</del> computer. This pint-sized fan plugs into your USB port and provides a steady breeze you can point in any direction.

Bring some humor to your doorstop with the ice cream cone door stop. Guests will wonder why there’s a melting ice cream cone stuffed under your door. You might have to clarify you’re not a slovenly mess since ice cream on the floor might be pretty gross.

The ninja disguise costume is ideal for wearing at social gatherings where making a clean getaway from dull conversations is top priority. As soon as a square asks ‘about your ninja disguise’, flip the front to summon your inner ninja and flee the scene.

Cast a magic spell of added flavor onto your unseasoned dinner with help from these magic wand salt and pepper shakers. Featuring both black and white magic wands for easy distinction between the salt and pepper, these shakers are perfect for making cooking magical.

Get over your silly childhood fear of clowns by pumping this zombie clown target full of lead and watch it bleed to death as you conquer your fear. This zombie clown shooting target is filled with pink liquid that bleeds out when it is shot, so you know when you’re hitting it.

Make birthday cakes even more special with these mesmerizing colored flame candles. This twelve candle pack features five different brilliant flame colors – you and your guests will easily be entranced by the fire just like you were cavemen experiencing it for the first time.

Feel just like the mighty Zeus as you hold the lightning bolt power strip in your hands. This clever power strip protects against electrical surges and has space for up to six outlets. It also makes a great addition for any whimsical computer room or children’s play room.

Camp out just like in the old days with the Volkswagen bus camping tent. The bus tent is designed to look exactly like the original and iconic VW Bus – and it will hold just as many people as the real bus can. It’s the ultimate outdoor hippie experience.

Bring the doggy door into the 21st century with the electronic doggy door. This automatic door features a quality design that is engineered for performance and reliability. Every time Rex wants to go in or out of the house, the small ultrasonic collar activates the door.

Defeat the great Bowser himself with your cunning moves when playing on the Super Mario Bros chess board. This geeky themed chess set features the entire gang from the iconic game series facing off in the ultimate battle between good and evil.

Experience a world of technicolor tunes with the color changing wireless speaker. This bluetooth enabled speaker is not only compatible with all major smart phones and MP3 players but also enthralls the senses with every hue on the color spectrum.

You do everything your with your dog – so why not drink with him too? With Bowser, the beer for the dogs, your best friend can join you on nights of drunken debauchery – acting as your wingman while picking up chicks, and having your back while you foolishly fight larger men.

When you’re in an emergency situation and don’t have an outlet to charge your iPhone, this hand crank phone charger can be a life saver. Just plug it in, give a few <del>thousand</del> cranks, and get to checking your news feed before you die of boredom.

Cowards need not apply to spend a night sleeping in the hanging tent platform. This suspended domicile makes a great resting spot for the weary and experienced mountain climber that has no qualms in spending the night hanging from a vertical mountainside.

Forget Power Wheels, now you can get your spoiled little brat an electric driveable car that fits his high standards with the Lamborghini Murcialago kid’s car. It may not go 217 MPH like a real Murcialago, but it’ll be sure to leave the other kids’s cars in the dust.

Your dog is already a terrifying beast, so give him the best outlet for his reign of terror with the raptor dog costume. This costume turns your lap dog into a tiny version of T-Rex, the king of all dinosaurs. It will match his tiny, vicious howl.

With the hidden flask tie firmly secured around your neck, no amount of overtime or TPS reports will be able to crush your spirit, or kill your buzz. Apart from improving your creativity at work it will also make you the sharpest dressed employee at every casual Friday.

Give your lips the Midas touch with these gold glitter lips temporary tattoos. Perfect for giving your face a head turning look, these gold glitter lips temporary tattoos are easy to apply and will last up to eight hours, which is longer than most lipsticks.

Don’t just keep your gun a little bit safe — keep it completely locked down with the fingerprint gun safe. The fingerprint gun case only allows authorized fingerprints to access the safe, so you can store you guns without worry of unwanted use.

Now you can style yourself after your favorite rainbow farting intergalactic feline by sporting the Nyan Cat hoodie. This fashionable and comfortable sweater will keep you warm and give you that awesome 8-bit look without the unsightly pop-tart body ruining your figure.

Surviving the outdoors is about to get a whole lot easier with the light up tactical knife in your arsenal of camping goodies. Whether it’s midday or the dead of night, this versatile knife will ensure you conquer the wild and make it out alive; Bear Grylls, eat your heart out.

The dead guy pen holder won’t make you a better employee or get you that coveted and well deserved raise but it will help keep you sane and organized at work. It’s the desktop accessory no nerve-racking job can do, or should do without.

Finally, using the flame-less color changing candles you’ll be able to set the perfect mood without having to worry about accidentally setting your room on fire. These Smokey The Bear approved candles are an ideal source of alternate lighting for any room in the home.

Crack your beer open right in the kitchen. The simple, sleek bottle opener fridge magnet is the perfect accessory for any fridge that holds beer. Never lose your bottle opener with this fridge magnet — it’s right in view before and after you reach in to grab a cold one.

Everyone needs a convenient USB hub, so he or she can keep track of the phone plug, the camera plug, and the mouse plug — with this battleship USB hub, you can keep track of all of the above while making boat and bomb noises under your breath.

Bring the fun out of your serious strategy games partners with the wobble chess set. At first it may seem like another fancy chess board with shiny pieces, but once the wiggle and wobbling starts, it’ll even have your non-chess playing friends wanting to join in.

These light up shutter shades will transport you back to the decade of bad fashion – the eighties – but with the excellent modern technology of LED lights. Just put these on shutter shades on, turn off the lights, and party like it’s 1989.

Mercilessly destroy your liver with this thrilling drinking game of spin the shot glass. Combining the elements of statistics and alcoholism, this fun drinking game is perfect for a few friends to gather around and see who can survive after a few hours of reckless drinking.

Have a killer performance with this Friday The 13th guitar pick that will have your audience dying for more. Inspired by the iconic horror flick’s ominous hockey mask, these Friday The 13th Guitar picks come in a pack of six, and are perfect for musically talented serial killers.

If you are a cotton candy fan, you should check out the mini cotton candy machine. The cotton candy machine makes every day into a day at the fair with mini cotton candy cones for you and your friends. Just put the ingredients in, scoop it up, and enjoy the the sugar rush.

Honor the classic video game you were addicted to as a kid with the Donkey Kong wall sticker set. With this sticker set, you can reenact the iconic game, as Mario attempts to save the princess from the clutches of Mr. Kong. It is the perfect decoration for an arcade room.

Imagine a world in which Tetris and Connect Four could be married and produce offspring in the form of a tabletop game — well, that world is real, and the Connect Four Tetris game truly exists. It is called Tetris Link – it is addictive, interactive, and fun for the whole family.

Go keyless in your household with this finger scanning door lock. Perfect for locking down your home with nearly impossible to crack security, this clever deadbolt door lock will only open if your fingerprint has been authorized for entry.

Give your office corkboard a taste of the macabre with Medieval weapon push pins, the only push pins that are manufactured after real weapons of the Dark Ages. You can exact revenge on expense accounts or employee contact lists with daggers, axes, and swords.

Happy birthday, soldier! Serving proudly as the perfect decoration for a military themed birthday cake, these green Army Men candles come in a set of five, each with their own unique pose from bad-ass rocket launcher guy to everyone’s least favorite radio guy.

Look stylish without dealing with the hassle of using complicated tying techniques with these wooden bow ties. These hand crafted wooden bow ties come in a variety of beautifully finished wood styles, and are the perfect way to stand out while still looking classy.

No bachelor pad would be complete without this convertible billiards table that goes from a lovely eating area to a fully functional pool table in just seconds. It’s great for the home, but also works great in offices where it can double as a conference table.

Turn your home pool into a legit Tiki bar with these underwater pool chairs. The pool stool is made of durable plastic and fills with water as a stabilizer. The stool then stays in place to hold your bottom while you laze about and order a drink from the cabana boy.

Look absolutely menacing in this Shredder hoodie. This officially licensed Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles inspired hoodie features intimidating shoulder and forearm spikes, as well as a zip up/down mask to give you a truly terrifying appearance.

These Rubik’s Cube coasters will take you and your guests back to the early childhood joy of the Rubik’s Cube. The good thing is that you won’t get frustrated with these in any way — they’re already solved, and they’ll prevent your drinks from causing rings on your coffee table.

Now you can make your loyal best friend some homemade doggie biscuits with love thanks to this doggie biscuit maker. Included are all the tools you’ll need to be whipping up several different types of mouth watering biscuits for your pooch.

The Titanic ship bath plug gives a maritime feeling to any bathing experience. This Tubtanic plug, modeled after the Titanic itself, will sink grandly in your bathtub. You can think of all sorts of romantic subplots and sinking violinists while you scrub.

Keep your feet warm inside the heads of decapitated zombies with these creepily realistic zombie slippers. These slippers are created to look like real zombie heads, with popping out eyes, blue-toned skin, and blood soaked teeth.

If you feel that the iPhone has become to mainstream, send it back to its hipster roots with this retro corded phone handset. It’s the perfect phone accessory for senior citizens who fear new age technology, and the ironic youth who have terrible taste in everything.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Dog Ball
content: Keep the fun going all night with the glow in the dark dog ball. Perfect for a game of fetch in the middle of the night, this durable and safe to chew on glow in the dark dog ball will keep your canine entertained for hours on end, ensuring you never get a good night’s rest.

Fix that unruly disaster in the morning you call hair in just seconds with the morning head hair cap. This revolutionary hair cap will give you that “just showered” hair style, without having to dunk your head under a sink. Ask someone to give you morning head today!

You might not be over seven feet tall, but you can still look like the great Chewbacca from Star Wars with this epic fur hoodie. With a thick lining of insulation, the Chewbacca fur hoodie is guaranteed you’ll never need to cut open a tauntaun to survive the cold nights.

Quit straining your neck while you read – with the lazy glasses you can lie down on your comfortable bed and still be able to enjoy a good book or magazine. The lazy glasses use a clever prism design to let you recline and look forward at the same time.

Beat your meat like it owes you money with this take no prisoners brass knuckles meat tenderizer. The meaner and surlier you get, the more that meat will melt in your mouth at dinnertime. And you’ll be in a better mood when you eat.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Duct Tape
content: Go to the next level with your various duct tape projects with the glow in the dark duct tape. Whether you are making yourself a duct tape dress, wallet, boat, house, or even a duct tape time machine – all of your projects will look that much cooler when they glow in the dark.

Have a killer party on the water with this giant inflatable lounger. Capable of fitting up to eight party animals comfortably afloat this massive floating lounger decked out with cup holders and supportive seats, you’ll never want to leave the water again.

Make your iPhone stand out from the rest with these Star Wars iPhone cases. With your option of Darth Vader, C-3PO, R2-D2, and Chewbacca themed cases, these officially licensed Star Wars iPhone cases are sure to turn a few geeky heads.

Why should Halloween be the only holiday where you can wear awesome costumes? You should be able to dress up for Christmas too. With this gingerbread man costume, you can freak out all the kids in your neighborhood while honoring the spirit of Christmas.

As an obsessive online shopper, you’ll need to buy something to remind you not to shop. Of course, you’ll need to buy it online, but no one will know. This tiny shopping cart, purchased from your online cart, will remind you it’s time to … what was it … buy more?

Make your daily bathing routine a bit more psychedelic with the Absinthe soap bar. While some prefer to use caffeinated soap bars to wake up during their morning shower, the absinthe soap bar will wake you up in a completely new way – with drugs!

If you want to make it into the pros, you’ll need to practice all day and all night. And now with the glow in the dark basketball, playing ball in the darkness is no longer an issue as this light up ball will keep the training sessions and pick up games lasting til midnight.

No doomsday prepper should be without this emergency water container. When disaster strikes, you’ll have 100 gallons of fresh water to store in your bathtub that will last you up to four weeks. Now the only problem you’ll have is dealing with the collapse of civilization.

Look down right chivalrous while staying warm with this crocheted knight helmet hat. With its thick padded armor and functional moving visor, the knight helmet hat is sure to land you a damsel or two. You’ll feel just like a real knight, minus the whole noble birth thing.

This wine cork wreath is the perfect way to passive-aggressively reflect your feelings about the winter holidays. It tells the world, “Please, if you come to the work party, bring two bottles of wine instead of your disgusting potato salad.”

Nothing is uglier than a pile of power cords, sitting around behind your entertainment center, collecting dust. With the power cord management station, you can appease your OCD leanings, clean up the dust, and create a pleasantly organized power cord assembly.

Make delicious sushi in the convenience of your own kitchen with this do it yourself sushi rolling kit. Perfect for the novice sushi chef, the sushi rolling kit has everything you’ll need to get started making up dragon rolls, spider rolls, godzilla rolls, and even barrel rolls.

The yellow submarine tea infuser will take a tumble into the depths of your tea for the purpose of giving your beverage flavor and body. The submarine troop takes its mission seriously, and it will sink to the bottom of your mug to release your tea’s essence.

Don’t let a little water stop you from exploring the great outdoors – with the waterproof backpack you can easily carry your gear around and rest easy knowing the contents in your backpack are safe from a heavy downpour, flooding, or even waterfalls.

You’re definitely not in Kansas anymore with these Wizard Of Oz Doorstops. Featuring the Wicked Witch of the East’s ruby slippers and snake like feet, this decorative doorstop is a cute way to keep your doors open, and makes a great gift for Wizard Of Oz fans.

These light up penguin decorations are the perfect way to classy up your Christmas decorations. After all, your neighbor has that tacky inflatable snow globe, your grandma has a singing fish with a Santa hat, but nothing can ever compare to these classy little dudes.

Project an awe inspiring double rainbow anywhere in your home with this rainbow light projector. Perfect for brightening up a kid’s room with a beautiful display of colors, the rainbow light projector will have your children crying tears of joy.

Get into the Christmas spirit with these edible candy cane spoons. Included in this eating utensil set are six peppermint candy cane spoons that will add a tasty and holiday packed flavor when you use it to stir your hot chocolate drink.

Bring your cookware into the digital age with this precise digital measuring cup scale. Whether you want to measure liquids, powders, or <del>even drugs</del> chopped up foods, the digital measuring cup will accurately display the relevant unit of measurement.

Perform some surprise aerial attacks on your co-workers with this water shooting R/C helicopter. This easy to use and even easier to recharge mini helicopter features a built-in water cannon that precisely fires at your command, making it perfect for pranks.

Get Mojo the monkey nail blow dryer to assist you during your nail painting sessions and have them dry and beautiful looking in no time! He’ll huff, puff, and dry those nails mighty fast and look darn cute doing it too – all you need is a few AAA batteries to keep him energized.

Don’t let those Rebel scum get away with having all the fashion accessories – now you look straight Imperial with these Stormtrooper cuff links. These officially licensed three dimensional Stormtrooper helmet cuff links are a must have for any fashionable Imperial.

Send a powerful message when you seal your letters with this ominous skull wax seal stamp. Perfect for mailing threatening letters filled with Anthrax to your Ex, the skull wax seal stamp is the quintessential tool in envelope sealing technology.

Go on recon missions with this remote control spy tank that is controlled by any smart device such as an iPad, iPhone, or even Android. Simply install the app into your device and control the video capturing spy tank in any way you want.

Keep your fridge organized like a true ninja would with these deadly ninja star magnets. These strong and durable magnets are great for giving your fridge at home a fierce look to it without actually penetrating it with real ninja stars.

Ever wish you could “Like” stuff in real life by pushing a button or putting a Post-It on something you see? Now you can mount this Facebook “Like” button hanger in your home and hang up the stuff that you “Like.” You’ll be living in a virtual Facebook.

Now you can get mugged on the streets for even your key chains with these fresh to death Air Jordan key chains. Guaranteed to have ghetto people fixing to rob you, these ballerific key chains are highly detailed mini Air Jordans, and are great gift idea for sneakerheads.

Get revenge on the fat man for bringing you coal last Christmas by dropping off a “special gift” down his chimney. This four piece Santa Claus toilet cover will get your whole family into the Holiday spirit, though you may not like that passion they exhibit.

People say you are “down to earth”, so why not smell like earth too with Dirt cologne. Dirt cologne is scented with warm, dark, and earthy tones. That means it smells like dirt, and that you will too once you spritz yourself and walk through the mist.

Curse someone with obesity with these voodoo doll cookie cutters. Whether you want to break off their limbs piece by piece or devour someone whole, these voodoo doll cookie cutters will make torturing someone a breeze, and is a great gift idea for witch doctors.

Convert your boring face into a blocky and pixelated form with these Minecraft masks. These geeky officially licensed one size fits all cardboard Minecraft masks feature Steve and the infamous Creeper as a bundle package, but can also be purchased individually.

LEGOs are the building block of many great structures, but they can also be the building blocks for an ice cold drink with these LEGO man ice cube molds. Licensed by LEGO, these rubber molds are perfect for making ice or chocolate shaped LEGO men.

Have a tree of knowledge – literally – with this minimalistic tree bookshelf. With half a dozen uniquely shaped branches, you’ll have ample room to store and display books, dvds, picture frames, and whatever else your little money wasting heart desires.

Admire the beauty and mystery of our solar system on your Christmas tree with these solar system ornaments. Each planet is available individually or as a bundle with everything from Earth to Saturn, so you can decorate your tree with any of your favorite planets.

Great Scott, Marty! Now you can own a hover board without having to go back to the future and kiss your mom! Though it lacks the actual ability to hover – these Back To The Future replica hoverboards are a must have item for fans of this classic time traveling film.

Lift up your anchor and set sail for cleanliness with these adorably clever sailboat napkin holders. Available in either black or red colors, the sailboat napkin holders are a cute way to display your napkins on a kid’s table, a dinner table, or just a kitchen counter-top.

Complete your zombie apocalypse diorama with these disturbing plastic zombie men toys. Inspired by The Walking Dead zombie show and comic book, these Army Men toy like figurines come with ten zombies per bag – five brown and five green.

Get rid of the hassle of feeding your pestering offspring with the baby crib dribbler. Endorsed by celebrity role model Snooki Polizzi, the crib dribbler will make feeding your baby a breeze, and encourage him/her to become independent at a young age.

The Dude must abide when it comes to staying warm and looking good during the winter with the Big Lebowski Sweater. This comfy and stylish replica Cowichan sweater looks just like it did in the cult classic film, but that’s just like, our opinion, man.

Perfect your sharpshooter skills with this target practice alarm clock that forces you to become a good shot to effectively turn off the annoying wake up alarm. This wireless clock will make waking up in the morning fun again, and includes bonus practice modes.

Get every last bit of precious toothpaste out and save money with this practical toothpaste wringer. The toothpaste wringer is designed to stabilize the tube, and wind up to release the last tidbits of your tube’s contents. It’s a must have tool for the frugal.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Spit Balls
content: Get serious about your spitball ammunition with these glow in the spit balls. Capable of growing over two hundred times their original size, these fun to use glow in the dark spit balls explode upon impact – making them great for having all out spitball wars!

Make your stainless steel refrigerator look even sexier with a disembodied sexy, female leg bottle opener fridge magnet. Body parts on refrigerators are always sexy — what’s even better is that this one will actually open your beer for you.

Be the center of attention at the next black light party with this incredible line of black light makeup. Featuring a fine powder that has a bold reaction to UV light, this black light makeup comes with eight distinct colors so you can get truly creative when applying.

Pay homage to the best five-second clip on the internet with the forever memorialized dramatic chipmunk paiting. Hang this meme in your home or office so that you can wow all your nerd friends and coworkers. They’ll know that you’re not only relevant but also intensely dramatic.

The consummate gentleman always has a lighter to please his lady friends. Sometimes the gentleman does forget his lighter in his smoking jacket when he’s out on the town. Avoid this terrible faux-pas with the lighter ring, and you’ll never displease the ladies.

This is how you celebrate Christmas in ‘Merica! Shotgun shells as Christmas lights is the most patriotic thing you can possibly own, and when you combine it with a stuffed bald eagle as a tree topper, you’ll be celebrating the holidays like a true American! Bacon.

Pac-Man and cookies — together at last. You can set up an entire scene from Pac-Man on your dining room table, complete with mischievous little ghosts and yellow-frosted Pac-Men and Women. These cookie cutters are perfect for baking some nostalgic geeky treats.

It was so sad when Tom Hanks lost his only friend after they spent all of that time together tanning, losing weight, catching fish, and getting deathly ill. Make sure you never lose your WILSONNNNNN by stocking up on these blood drenched volleyballs for your cave.
